about_the_game:
Experience Football Like Never Before with VR Football Heading Challenge!

VR Football Heading Challenge brings the thrill of football into a fully immersive VR experience. Designed for players of all levels, this game combines fun, competition, and skill-building in dynamic gameplay. Perfect your headers, master your timing, and rise to the top in various challenges.

The game offers three distinct modes to keep the action fresh:

  • Fun Mode (Arcade): Hone your skills by heading the ball to knock down targets and score points in a fast-paced, action-packed environment. Perfect for casual and competitive players alike.

  • Training Mode: Dive into structured drills designed to improve your precision and timing. With personalized feedback and increasing difficulty, this mode helps you refine your skills step by step.

  • Multiplayer Mode: Test your skills against friends or global players in real-time. Compete in high-stakes matches to see who can achieve the best headers under pressure.

With realistic physics, intuitive controls, and vibrant environments, VR Football Heading Challenge delivers a balanced mix of fun and competition. Whether you’re a football enthusiast or looking for a unique workout experience, this game is designed to keep you engaged. Are you ready to use your head?

name: VR Football: Heading Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: All
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Oculus OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / AMD FX-8350
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: All
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Oculus OpenXR

Designed for players of all levels, this game combines fun, competition, and skill-building in dynamic gameplay. Perfect your headers, master your timing, and rise to the top in various challenges.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Swedish
